result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kwientien Lavonshay Baker

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Kwientien Lavonshay Baker appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Sylvan Jaspen appeared by video for Kwientien Lavonshay Baker.  Attorney Thomas Hasle for Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Preliminary hearing proceeded. Court took judicial notice of case 13CF4983. Sworn for the State: City of Cudahy Officer M. Ohm. State rest. Defense rests. Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial. Original Information received and filed; defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty. Defendant filed request for prompt disposition; defense withdraws request. Case is adjourned to Branch 09. Scheduling conference scheduled for December 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Kwientien Lavonshay Baker not in court, in custody in MSDF.  Attorney Sylvan Jaspen appeared by video for Kwientien Lavonshay Baker.  Prosecuting attorney Nate Kristian McClure in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Preliminary Hearing. Defendant is unable to be produced from MSDF. Case is adjourned. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Kwientien Lavonshay Baker appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Sylvan Jaspen not in court.  Abby Rockendorf in court, appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Attorney Jaspen Scheduling conflict. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Kwientien Lavonshay Baker in court, in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. SPD has not appointed counsel. State requests that the matter be set for a State V. Lee hearing or status; denied. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Kwientien Lavonshay Baker in court with attorney Jason A Findling.  Defendant Kwientien Lavonshay Baker in custody.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Kwientien Lavonshay Baker appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Stark, Branch 17.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-04, parties are hereby notified that effective 7/30/22, this case is assigned to branch 9, Judge Paul Van Grunsven in room 632 of the Courthouse.
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Letter from defendant re:  being produced for upcoming court date.  (Kwientien L. Baker - #616621, Milwaukee Secure Detention Facility, 1015 N 10th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Defendant Kwientien Lavonshay Baker not in court.   No Assistant District Attorney Available appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Initial appearance scheduled for this date 6/15/2022. Defendant is in custody at MSDF. Needs to be produced for court.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 6/15/2022 @1:30p
